text: Aap kahiye kay tumharay shurka mein koi aisa hai kay haq ka raasta batata ho? Aap keh dijiye kay Allah hi haq ka raasta batata hai. To phir aaya jo shaks haq ka raasta batata ho woh ziyada ittabaa kay laeeq hai ya woh shaks jiss ko baghair bataye khud hi raasta na soojhay? Pus tum ko kiya hogaya hai tum kaisay faislay kertay ho
